detectors.description:
AlphaHomoraBank.liquidate(uint256) (samples/tc/minimalsanitized/contracts_cleaned/ms_tc_020.sol#125-137) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- debt = (pos.debtShare * totalDebt) / totalDebtShare (samples/tc/minimalsanitized/contracts_cleaned/ms_tc_020.sol#128)
	- require(bool,string)(pos.collateral * 100 < debt * 150,Position is healthy) (samples/tc/minimalsanitized/contracts_cleaned/ms_tc_020.sol#132)
detectors.markdown:
[AlphaHomoraBank.liquidate(uint256)](samples/tc/minimalsanitized/contracts_cleaned/ms_tc_020.sol#L125-L137) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- [debt = (pos.debtShare * totalDebt) / totalDebtShare](samples/tc/minimalsanitized/contracts_cleaned/ms_tc_020.sol#L128)
	- [require(bool,string)(pos.collateral * 100 < debt * 150,Position is healthy)](samples/tc/minimalsanitized/contracts_cleaned/ms_tc_020.sol#L132)

detectors.description: AlphaHomoraBank._borrow(uint256,uint256) (samples/tc/minimalsanitized/contracts_cleaned/ms_tc_020.sol#68-87) ignores return value by ICErc20(cToken).borrow(amount) (samples/tc/minimalsanitized/contracts_cleaned/ms_tc_020.sol#86)

AlphaHomoraBank.repay(uint256,uint256) (samples/tc/minimalsanitized/contracts_cleaned/ms_tc_020.sol#92-106) should emit an event for: 
	- totalDebtShare -= shareToRemove (samples/tc/minimalsanitized/contracts_cleaned/ms_tc_020.sol#102) 
	- totalDebt -= amount (samples/tc/minimalsanitized/contracts_cleaned/ms_tc_020.sol#103)
